pull.title: ci: Remove deprecated container.greedy
pull.body: The option is to be phased out, so remove it to avoid relying on it. Update container.cpu where needed.

### Conflicts
No conflicts as of last run.

> The option is to be phased out,

It is still mentioned in https://cirrus-ci.org/guide/linux/#linux-containers.

> It is still mentioned

I asked by email.
Added an unrelated commit to adjust the CCACHE_SIZE. For some reason the jammy macOS taks is uncacheable? https://cirrus-ci.com/task/4744875699077120?logs=ci#L2486
